whatsNewHTML:
What's New

* Additional wind speed (knots and Beaufort) and pressure units included
* Reworked settings, now you can adjust weather parameters to be displayed on your screen
* More weather parameters added: chance of precipitation, dew point, wind chill, moonrise, moonset, sunrise, sunset
We appreciate your support and feedback - and are constantly working on making the app better.
Send us your impressions and share your weather tagged with #weatherlive.
description: Meet Weather Live. The most beautiful weather app. Ever.Don't let bad weather take you by surprise! Enjoy detailed forecasts and weather widgets. Set the gorgeous animated wallpapers with live weather conditions on your home screen and be aware of any weather that is coming your way. Whether it is cloudy, rainy, snowy or even stormy outside, Weather Live will provide you with current weather conditions and forecast in your city and multiple locations all around the world. Cold or warm weather, it will magically come alive on the crisp screen of your device. You won’t even have to look out the window as Weather Live will make you feel like you are already outside! With an innovative technology Weather Live™ implemented into the app, we made it possible! • Weather forecasts for multiple locations all around the world• Live weather scenes reflecting real-time weather conditions• Beautiful weather widgets • Fabulous animated wallpaper with live weather conditions right on your home screen• Cloud, satellite, rain maps. Animated weather radar for any location in the USA. Available through in-app purchase.• Customizable layout: short-term forecast, long-term forecast, text only• Local time in 12 or 24-hour format• 7-day and 24-hour weather forecast• "Feels Like" temperature. Today’s Min and Max• Wind direction and speed. Visibility details• Humidity and precipitation information. Pressure in inches, mm or mbar• Fahrenheit or Celsius and Miles or Kilometers• Easy navigation between cities: swipe either to the left or to the right to switch between locations• New York, Los Angeles, Chicago or any other location worldwide – get accurate weather forecasts wherever you are!Get Weather Live and be prepared for any weather!IMPORTANT DISCLOSURES AND CONSENTBy clicking to install this app you consent to the installation of this app and any updates or upgrades that are released. You understand and agree that this app (incl. any updates or upgrades) may (i) cause your device to automatically communicate with our servers to deliver the functionality described above and to make our products more efficient and effective, (ii) affect app-related preferences or data stored your device, and (iii) collect personal information to provide the features described above and as set out in our privacy policy. You can uninstall the app at any time. For assistance, please contact us atIAC Search and Media Europe Ltd.Unit 1, Digiweb BuildingCollege Business and Technology ParkBlanchardstown North Road, Dublin 15 Ireland ApalonPrivacy@ask.com
descriptionHTML:
Meet Weather Live. The most beautiful weather app. Ever.

Don't let bad weather take you by surprise! Enjoy detailed forecasts and weather widgets. Set the gorgeous animated wallpapers with live weather conditions on your home screen and be aware of any weather that is coming your way. Whether it is cloudy, rainy, snowy or even stormy outside, Weather Live will provide you with current weather conditions and forecast in your city and multiple locations all around the world.

Cold or warm weather, it will magically come alive on the crisp screen of your device. You won’t even have to look out the window as Weather Live will make you feel like you are already outside! With an innovative technology Weather Live™ implemented into the app, we made it possible!

• Weather forecasts for multiple locations all around the world
• Live weather scenes reflecting real-time weather conditions
• Beautiful weather widgets
• Fabulous animated wallpaper with live weather conditions right on your home screen
• Cloud, satellite, rain maps. Animated weather radar for any location in the USA. Available through in-app purchase.
• Customizable layout: short-term forecast, long-term forecast, text only
• Local time in 12 or 24-hour format
• 7-day and 24-hour weather forecast
• "Feels Like" temperature. Today’s Min and Max
• Wind direction and speed. Visibility details
• Humidity and precipitation information. Pressure in inches, mm or mbar
• Fahrenheit or Celsius and Miles or Kilometers
• Easy navigation between cities: swipe either to the left or to the right to switch between locations
• New York, Los Angeles, Chicago or any other location worldwide – get accurate weather forecasts wherever you are!

Get Weather Live and be prepared for any weather!


IMPORTANT DISCLOSURES AND CONSENT

By clicking to install this app you consent to the installation of this app and any updates or upgrades that are released. You understand and agree that this app (incl. any updates or upgrades) may (i) cause your device to automatically communicate with our servers to deliver the functionality described above and to make our products more efficient and effective, (ii) affect app-related preferences or data stored your device, and (iii) collect personal information to provide the features described above and as set out in our privacy policy. You can uninstall the app at any time. For assistance, please contact us at

IAC Search and Media Europe Ltd.
Unit 1, Digiweb Building
College Business and Technology Park
Blanchardstown North Road, Dublin 15 Ireland
ApalonPrivacy@ask.com
whatsNew: * Additional wind speed (knots and Beaufort) and pressure units included* Reworked settings, now you can adjust weather parameters to be displayed on your screen* More weather parameters added: chance of precipitation, dew point, wind chill, moonrise, moonset, sunrise, sunsetWe appreciate your support and feedback - and are constantly working on making the app better.Send us your impressions and share your weather tagged with #weatherlive.

topReviews.reviewText: The app works great but if you change the widget at all it makes you re-enter your location each and every time. There's also the fact that if you want to access the alarm settings through the clock displayed in the app you have to upgrade to the $3 app. This is a feature offered for free with other apps. Other than that it works greats.

Works nicely, and there's a cool function to display the current temperature in the topbar. But the thing is you can't remove that city, or organize your list of cities in such a manner that you actually see your local temperature up there. That is, unless you live in Potwin, KS. Rating would be up to 5 if it weren't for Thai one thing.

Very nice application. Thank you! It would be just  better without those annoying ads. I really don't feel comfortable when there is a risk of accidently touching them and downloading something which i didn't really intended to.

I've tried a bunch of weather apps and some would just stop updating, even if you manually hit the refresh button, or won't include a decent amount of information, but this app has it all. Very attractive widget, lots of helpful information, and so far has been accurate and good at updating on it's own
It keeps me very informed on local temps and conditions outside I recomend for others to download .
Helpful app, and the most thing I like is the interactive background theme with the actual weather.

Installed the app for the eye-pleasing interface and widgets. After using it a few days I've found the temperature is off anywhere from 10-15 degrees even after manually updating it. Looks nice but totally inaccurate, so what's the point when accuracy matters most when it comes to the weather. Uninstalling as soon as I post this review.

Great looking widgets and plenty of choice. Easily the best free and paid Weather App on the Android market. The free version is very usable and functional. However the free version does have popup boxes every time you open it up and ads at the bottom but it's FREE! The paid version is totally free of ads and is just as beautiful at £1.60. Totally worth it in my book as long as the app isn't broken with future updates. I highly recommend this!
The weather app that came with my phone is stupid! This one is pleasing to the eye and is accurate. All the weather info is on one page. No scrolling necessary. - Rykk James
Easy to navigate, beautiful interface, accurate weather forecast, informative widget.
I'm a all season biker this app always sends me in the weather prepared.. Love that it has wind chill and other details on main page +5day weather
Sometimes I feel like its inaccurate by a little but for the most part very nice
After phone reset the widget is dead 5 of 10 times and it stays dead for a while, sometimes couple of days and few resets are not enough to revive it.

Very beatiful and good customization. Could you guys create a widget where it displays the week prediction aswell as the main thing but without that "pressure,humidity,sunrise,etc" bar ? Or maybe there is a way to disable it ? Because i want just the weather at the moment plus prediction for week. Thanks
Great, gives me actual weather for my area including humidity & what it feels like outside.
Nice app. Would be better if users have the option to choose to view more of the next day's  hourly weather.
IT'S WORK 100% ALL MY PHONES S4,S4 MINI.NOW YOUR NEXT UPDATE PLEASE ADD BATTERY LEVEL AND DATE ! ! ! ! !
Just what I was looking for when I park my tablet on the desk and charge it up.  Automatically goes into desktop mode.

I call this as #1 weather app giving accurate weather; I tried many other weather apps who claim to be  the best but for me this is the best weather app so far with  accurate information and the widget on the home screen gives the expected results. I love it.

I found other programs, but they were all multi screens. I like the information right up front without having to search for the information. I am a little old fashioned , I do not want extra "stuff" when I want something it should be right n front of me.
topReviews.reviewTitle: I enjoy having everything on one screen.

topReviews.reviewText: This apps is amazing, Show all features like temperature,whether report to every hours.........
Knots added.thanks!
sirens are blasting, weather live shows light rain with thunder. Not very helpful. The time & temp are correct. 💨
Working in a middle school, I need accurate up to date weather and this app is so very helpful!
Really like the way it has been made,the way that gives it's im formation, it's design,that's why I have,it's different to the others
Wish we could have more cities rather than two from the free version
Great but need to pay for further adition if its free then would be nice
Its a very nice app. Gives me all the weather up dates and is present to the eye
Really nice complete weather app. Just wish you could change transparency, hard to read against most wallpapers.
I love all the information right before your eyes and all in one weather report and other information
Nice looking widget and weather, pretty accurate in my city, alot of spam inside weather screen.
I need more than 3 cities temperature but it covers 2 only
Very accurate, needs refreshing at times to get current weather, but other than that, extremely pleased.
Why is this app not working I paid a 1.99 an it's just a blue screen.. I would like a reimbursement
Excellent app, 4.9 stars. Add precip percentage to each 3 hour forecast reading and get 5 stars. Nice job with customization. More widget display customization please.
Nice. However, can't you guys remove the product promotion popups when I enter the app? Very annoying.
Does great job but can't find Dallas Texas and that's a major city.

Widgets are broken and don't show any info, my other issues are that I cant turn off auto updates, or set them to be later than 6 hours or set them to manual refresh via a widget button, i also can't remove some of the "features" such as the clock on it that consumes battery life because it keeps trying to sync with the time, but it's great otherwise, contains Alot of info on the widgets which i love, and right now it's the only weather program i use
topReviews.reviewTitle: Lacks functionality when trying to save battery

topReviews.reviewText: Keeps saying network connection error and can't fetch data, when I do have connection.
Why can't you change the color of the temp. in the notification bar?? I would like it to be white to match the rest of my icons and because I can't see blue text on most of my backgrounds.
